articles.title: CES 2024: This Home Backup Battery Actually Costs Less Than $5,000 - CNET
articles.description: Goal Zero's Haven system only needs a couple hours of an electrician's time to install.
articles.content: Home battery backup systems can be a huge help when the power goes out. But they're expensive. Like $10,000 or more. I checked out a system at CES 2024 that, if not cheap, is at least a little more r… [+4015 chars]
